source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,536, further increased by 929 while you remain within its light.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 3,509 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 515 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
